UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Native thrombocidin-1 and unfolded thrombocidin-1 exert antimicrobial activity via distinct structural elements.
Literature.Author: Kwakman PH, Krijgsveld J, de Boer L, Nguyen LT, Boszhard L, Vreede J, Dekker HL, Speijer D, Drijfhout JW, te Velde AA, Crielaard W, Vogel HJ, Vandenbroucke-Grauls CM, Zaat SA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(LC=30µM),Escherichia coli ML-35p(LC=120µM),Staphylococcus aureus 42D(LC=>120µM),Cryptococcus neoformans(LC=30µM)
